description: Gilliam is a member of the royalty, Hime`s older brother. He first appeared in chapter 35, where he is seen attempting to kill Hime during the phenomena. He appeared at chapter 38 where he fired at the train which Hiro and Emile are on. He told Hime that the Professor had abandoned them and was letting Emil win. He wanted to blow the train up for the benefit of all and asked Hime which side she was on.
name: Gilliam
